text: Christopher Charles Pappas ( ; born June 4, 1980) is an American politician who has been the U.S. representative from New Hampshire's 1st congressional district since 2019. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Pappas is the first openly gay man to represent New Hampshire in Congress. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman Chris Pappas official U.S. House website *Campaign website * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:LGBT politicians Category:Members of the New Hampshire General Court Category:United States representatives from New Hampshire Category:People from Manchester, New Hampshire Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Chris Pappas
